column1: '''''The 1989 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] on [[25 August]] [[1988]]. It features art by [[Roger Garland]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'', ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' and ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.
* January - "[[:File:Roger Garland - The Haven of Moriondë.jpg
* February - "[[:File:Roger Garland - Return of the Shadow.JPG
* December - "[[:File:Roger Garland - Luthien in the Woods.JPG
column2: Lúthien in the Woods of Neldoreth]]"
